s: Was surprised it was an authentic Spot Hogg light. Works amazing, almost too bright in the brightness setting. I posted some pics and videos of how it looks/operates. t: Spot Hogg Archery Products
s: If you want something like the Hogg Father but on a little diet this will do the trick. Balances great on my Mathews Vertix. Take your time sighting in and get your windage and elevation right @20 yds. Then get your tape on and walk it back out to 60. What I found after sighting this sight in several times with diff weights and brands¬†...
